"Who would believe this is the miraculous power?
He's not like that cicada's skull.
With one sound, he woke up his bed of urine.

source_sentence: (懿山德)福州牛頭微禪師(投子同嗣)僧問如何是和尚家風。
translation: (I Shande) Fuzhou Niutou Wei Chanshi (the same heir as Douzi) The monk asked how was the monk's family style.
The master said.
"A mountain shepherd strips off the millet for food.
The wild vegetables are yellow and crispy.

source_sentence: 曰忽遇上上客來又作麼生。
translation: He asked what happened when he suddenly met a visitor from above.
The master said.
'I'll accept your request to eat.
If you don't eat it, you can eat it east or west.'
Ying Shan-yen said.
'Raw iron casts the heart and liver.'
It makes a loud clanking sound.
Zongjian falin vol. 65
